mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_AT, PASSWORD_ERROR_COUNT, LOGIN_COUNT, LAST_LOGIN_AT, USER_TYPE_CODE, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, DEVICE_ID, UUID FROM user WHERE EMAIL = #{email} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( USER_NAME, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, USER_TYPE_CODE, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, DEVICE_ID, UUID ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{loginId}, #{loginPassword}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{userTypeCode}, NOW(), #{createdBy}, NOW(), #{updatedBy}, #{deviceId}, #{uuid} )
